alert.note: Alert for Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 8:20PM CDT until June 22 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KNOX AND SOUTHWESTERN BAYLOR COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rhineland, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Munday, Knox City, Benjamin, Goree, Vera, and Rhineland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
